sponsor: Johnson & Johnson Pharmaceutical Research & Development, L.L.C.
briefTitle: Evaluation of Effectiveness and Safety of Paliperidone Extended Release in Patients With Schizoaffective Disorder.
officialTitle: A Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled, Parallel-group Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Two Dosages of Paliperidone ER in the Treatment of Patients With Schizoaffective Disorder.
summary: The purpose of this study is to measure the effectiveness and assess the safety of two dosages of the antipsychotic paliperidone extended-release (ER) in patients who are experiencing an acute episode of schizoaffective disorder.

primaryOutcome.measure: Baseline Positive and Negative Symptoms of Schizophrenia (PANSS) Total Score
